greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(2*n) = 2 * a(n). a(2*n - 1) = 2 * a(n) - 2 - (-1)^n, for all n in Z.
comment: Integers n>=0 such that a(n) = 1 is A118113.
Fibbinary numbers (A003714) give all integers n>=0 for which a(n+1) = 1 or 2. - _Michael Somos_, Feb 21 2016
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
formula: a(n) = -A163617(-n) for all n in Z.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 01 2009
